alt: The Super Bowl is actually an elaborate ruse, concocted by a shadowy group in the mid sixties for this purpose.  The 'watch it for the ads' addition was a master stroke.
title: Super Bowl
transcript:
[[A green car with the text next to it]]
My hobby:
While everyone is watching
the Super Bowl, feeling
smugly superior because
they're "Only watching for
the ads," I steal cars.
